listing.listing_description: Find a picture-perfect retreat in the heart of Sun Valley at Eagle Lake Estate. Tucked onto a lakeside lot in the shadow of the Idaho mountains, this charming vacation rental boasts gorgeous views, magazine-worthy interiors and luxury accommodations for parties of up to twelve. Even better, it’s less than 10 minutes from the nearest ski slope and the downtown area of Ketchum.Take in the views from a terrace with an al-fresco dining area, a barbecue and a hot tub, or stroll the manicured grounds and listen to the birds singing in the trees. If you’ve been out in the mountains all day, unwind with the help of the villa’s Apple TV, surround-sound system, Wi-Fi, wet bar and gas fireplace. For your comfort, there’s also heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities.Eagle Lake Estate pairs the rustic appeal of mountain lodges with the romance of European estates throughout its more than 7,000 square feet of space. At its heart is a two-story great room with living and dining areas; step through a doorway and into a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and nook. Luxe details like plush fabrics, a stone fireplace surround and framed Hermes scarves give the spaces a certain sophistication.The estate has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including one that opens to the hot tub and one with a private balcony, and two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms. The fifth bedroom is perfect for a family on holiday together, with two twin bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.No matter what your activity of choice, you’ll find year-round excitement close to Eagle Lake Estate. Its Hailey location puts you close to biking and cross-country ski trails, scenic hiking, great fly fishing spots and downhill skiing at Sun Valley. If shopping and dining are more your thing, make the short drive into Ketchum for a look at its galleries or a honeymoon-worthy dinner.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cypress trees, stone walls and arched loggias bring a little bit of Tuscany to the Texas hills at this Italian-inspired estate outside Austin. While the architecture takes its inspiration from traditional countryside villas, the amenities are state of the art, from a movie theater to a private gym with a sauna. It’s 10 miles to the galleries, museums, music venues, boutiques, and bars downtown. Arches and columns frame the 180-degree views over the villa’s infinity pool, hot tub, and a sunny terrace dotted with loungers. A shaded area houses the alfresco living and dining areas, a barbecue, and an outdoor fireplace, and a lower-level patio has a firepit. Take a quiet moment in the sauna and massage chair, have a movie night with friends and family in the home theater, and test your skill at the pool table. The same style of arches, hung with lanterns, usher you into the hallway connecting the living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen of this vacation rental. High ceilings and stone floors give the spaces a cool airiness on the hottest days, and floor-length drapes and wrought-iron chandeliers give a sense of rustic chic. There are 4 bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and 1 in a separate casita; all 5 have ensuite bathrooms. The main house has 1 bedroom with a king bed and 3 bedrooms with queen beds. The casita has a queen bed and 2 twin bunk beds as well as a kitchenette, and could be used by a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy or parents traveling with younger children. The villa is 10 miles from downtown Austin, where you can catch a live concert, stop by a bungalow transformed into a bar, have dinner at a restaurant in a former warehouse, and find a one-of-a-kind souvenir of your holiday. It’s just under 7 miles from Zilker Metropolitan Park, home to the 3-acre natural-wonder Barton Springs Pool. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cortina 1 is a beautiful private residence in Telluride, offering ski-in/ski-out access to Sundance ski trail, breathtaking mountain views, and exquisite living areas. As part of the Villas at Cortina—a spectacular new complex of luxury villas here—Cortina 1 provides easy access to world-class slopes and amenities along with the privacy of home.Savor evenings with family and friends in the stunning, open-plan living area. The luminous lounge, surrounded by tall windows with expansive mountain views of the Sneffels Range, is ideal for post-adventure relaxation, while the adjoining sitting area invites you to warm drinks. Kindle a fire as you enjoy a sumptuous feast at the elegant dining table. The fully equipped kitchen includes Wolf and Subzero appliances, along with granite surfaces and handcrafted wood cabinetry. From the living room, French doors open to the terrace, where you'll light the barbeque grill and relish the crisp air. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, giving a tastefully contemporary take on classic alpine elegance.The bedrooms combine beauty and coziness, creating the perfect private sanctuaries for downtime and rest. Downstairs, the master suite features a king bed, gas fireplace, mountain-view terrace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and bath. The guest bedrooms include one with queen bed and one with a twin-over-queen bunk bed (ideal for kids), and share a Jack & Jill bathroom between them. On the main floor, the guest master suite includes a king bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub.Beyond your residence, you'll enjoy shared access to top-shelf amenities. Soak your body in the outdoor hot tub and a plunge into the pool after a long day on the slopes. Relax in the owners' lounge or by the stunning outdoor fireplace on the patio. Work up a sweat in the fitness room and restore your muscles with a steam. Cortina also provides a Cadillac Escalade shuttle throughout Mountain Village, as well as a guest garage, ski lockers, and elevator.In addition to ski-in/ski-out access, you're just a mile and a half from Telluride Ski Resort base, while Telluride Golf Club is just two miles away. Venture eleven miles to visit the beautiful Alta Lakes and its enchanting ghost town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Business License ID: 005304

listing.listing_description: Vines creep up columns and brick arches overhead at this traditional stone mansion just outside downtown Austin. The splashing of the pool water feature makes a calming backdrop to dinner outdoors or drinks inside the newly renovated, window-lined rooms. It’s 10 miles from the 1-acre property to a free tour of the Texas State Capitol building and a hike to the viewpoint atop Mount Bonnell. Spend sunny days reading outside on the loungers, cooling off in the swimming pool, trying to dunk on friends and family on the private basketball court, and serving fare from the outdoor kitchen at the alfresco table for 6. Make it a movie night in the home theater, binge-watch the latest season of a show on the streaming TV, or share updates from your holiday via Wi-Fi. Shaded by lush landscaping and a tiled roof, this vacation rental feels hidden away. Stone walls and barrel-vaulted brick ceilings add to the charm in the open-plan living room, dining room, and fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar. A wall of windows overlooking the pool terrace fills the space with light. There are 4 bedrooms in the main house of this luxury estate and 1 in a separate casita. The main house has a master bedroom with a king bed and ensuite bathroom, 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and 1 bedroom with a queen bed that shares a hall bathroom with a children’s room, which has a twin-over-queen bunk bed. The casita is a private retreat perfect for a honeymoon-style escape, with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. A stay at this villa means you’re 9 minutes from teeing off at the nearest golf course and less than 10 miles from Zilker Metropolitan Park, whose nearly 400 acres include the spring-fed, natural-wonder Barton Springs Pool. Drive 10 miles for a tour of the state capitol building, and 11 miles to the restaurants, bars, venues, and museums of downtown Austin. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Briarcrest villa sits on a private cul-de-sac in beautiful Beverly Hills, California. Perched above the city, the villa features unobstructed sweeping views from the Los Angeles skyline to the shores of Malibu.Sleek white decor and sophisticated design embody a sense of tasteful luxury at Briarcrest. The grounds include a pristine swimming pool, alfresco dining area, barbecue, television, a three car parking garage, and a pool-side cabana. Grab a tropical cocktail at the private wet bar or lounge in the sunshine in one of many outdoor chairs - on the grass or on the pool’s baja shelf. At night, you can relax with your friends and family by the fire pit. This home exudes warmth and sophistication with modern amenities at every turn.Inside, the villa features an in-home theatre, surround sound in every room, ten large flat screen televisions, and an open plan kitchen with professional appliances. Five bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests and the master suite features a king bed, sitting area, television, air conditioning and ensuite bathroom as well as sliding doors that lead to an outdoor lounge. Minutes away from Rodeo Drive, Soho House, and the legendary Sunset Strip, Briarcrest villa is the perfect choice for those looking for tranquility and access to Los Angeles’ best hot spots.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-001283

listing.listing_description: Enjoy spectacular views and interiors to match at Caldera Newberry. Set on the slopes of Jackson Hole Resort, this beautifully appointed vacation rental is part of Caldera House, an exclusive all-suite property that provides the luxury of a hotel with the comforts of a private home. Invite up to eight friends or family members to join you on a ski holiday to remember in a stunning location.After a day of skiing, hiking or fly-fishing, repair to the villa’s balcony, which features a hot tub, barbecue, al-fresco dining for six, a firepit and views of Rendezvous Mountain. On cooler evenings, entertain indoors with the help of the media room, Apple TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. There’s also a cozy fireplace and a convenient wine fridge, along with laundry facilities.Caldera Newberry is laid out around an open-concept great room with incredible design and furnishings by Commune. Natural textures of stone and wood, earth tones of ochre and charcoal, and modern silhouettes lend an inviting sophistication to the living area, while custom millwork defines the dining area and fully equipped kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own balcony, and one bedroom with three twin bunk beds that’s wonderful for younger guests. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.The slopeside location of Caldera House gives guests ski-in access from Jackson Hole Resort and puts you just a 1-minute walk from the resort’s aerial tram. For après-ski shopping and dining, make the 2-minute walk to the center of Teton Village or the short drive to the town of Jackson. It’s also an easy trip to the nearest golf course, and while you’re in Wyoming, it’s well worth making the drive to Grand Teton National Park or the south entrance of Yellowstone National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surf the Manhattan Beach waves and return to barbeque meals, sunset cocktails, and festive nights in the game room. Offering a quintessential experience of this iconic town south of Los Angeles, the villa combines gallery-worthy artwork, a cavernous home cinema, and a gourmet kitchen among other amenities. Glide on bicycles along the The Strand or walk to some of the South Bay's finest nigh spots.The 3-story house features outdoor living areas on all levels, with completely unobstructed views of the beach and ocean. On the lower terrace, sun loungers beckon you into the Pacific sun, while a barbecue grill serves an alfresco dining table beneath a parasol.Glass doors open to a bi-level living and dining room, allowing the villa to breathe the sea-kissed air. The lower level includes a comfy lounge and bar, while the upper platform features a dining area and chef-grade kitchen with Miele appliances and marble surfaces. A gas fireplace keeps you toasty during evening wine tastings, while air conditioning provides comfort when necessary.The entertainment floor brings this villa to the next level. Challenge each other at pool or vintage arcade games, and screen Hollywood classics from the projector while sinking into sumptuous armchairs.The master suite enjoys exceptional views from its bedroom and private balcony, with a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity. The guestrooms both have queen beds and a shared bathroom with dual vanity.Famous as the origin of beach volleyball, Manhattan Beach also offers wonderful biking, running, and walking paths, as well as fun-filled activities for families or groups of friends. Venice, Marina del Rey, and Santa Monica are a short drive up the coast, and LAX is less than five miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in Beaver Creek’s Village Walk neighborhood, this fabulous luxury property offers amazing furnishings combined with arguably the best ski-in/ski-out access in the area. During your stay at Village Walk 102, you and your guests will enjoy direct access to the Dally ski way, and the Centennial gondola lift is just a jaunt away. This chalet is also within easy walking distance of the village boutiques, galleries, bars and restaurants, which are all conveniently linked via heated escalators and walkways.After a fun-filled day on the mountain, little could compare to slipping into the soothing bubbles of the private outdoor hot tub. The grounds at this stunning vacation rental also feature a heated patio, a barbeque and a fire pit. The perks inside include an ice maker, a media unit with a sound system, Wi-Fi and a convenient mud room.The interiors of Village Walk 102 feature vaulted ceilings in the great room, modern furnishes throughout and high end appliances in the gourmet kitchen. The living area also features a set of two-story bay windows that allow light to flood inside as well as a comfortable set of couches and a stone fireplace. The formal dining area offers a chic set for eight. The adjacent kitchen is open plan and includes a center island breakfast bar. A separate den offers a games table, dart board, fireplace and media unit.Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking holiday home. All of the bedrooms provide fine linens and en-suite bathrooms. The master suite features a king size bed, walk-in closet, fireplace and television. Two suites have queen size beds and the final bedroom includes two twin beds. Wake up each morning to brilliant pastoral views!Located in the heart of skiing country, various nature walks and hikes make great activities for the warmer months. The Red Sky Golf Club is also located nearby with its world renown Norman Course. If you time your visit for mid-summer, the Bravo! music festival welcomes top level classical music ensembles who cast their celestial notes across the mountains and valleys. Experience the best of Colorado with Luxury Retreats!Business License Number: 003670Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ The City of Palm Springs ID # 3335 _This gorgeous Palm Springs luxury villa, situated a few minutes from downtown, enjoys wonderful proximity to several world-class golf courses and is an easy drive to Indio and the Coachella Festival Grounds. Newly designed and built in 2017, the villa features superb alfresco living and dining areas, spectacular views of the Sonoran Desert hills, exquisite interior spaces appointed with high-end appliances and amenities, and six fabulous bedroom suites. For families and friends seeking a supreme balance of convenience, style, and contemporary comforts in the Southern California desert, 5 Palms Estate is an ideal choice.The villa's terrace has the air of a beautiful desert oasis, with lush gardens surrounding a sparkling swimming pool and hot tub. The pool's submerged shelf is furnished with loungers and armchairs, ideal for savoring the sun over cool refreshments. Cook a barbeque lunch at the grill and relish it alfresco at the mountain-view table, watching the hills deepen in beauty as day yields to evening. At night, kindle the fire pit and savor a California wine under the canopy of stars.The terrace joins the fabulous interior through ample glass doors, creating a magnificent space for relaxation and entertainment. Spend evenings with family and friends in the sumptuous living room, staying warm by the fire and watching the large TV. Prepare meals in the superb, fully equipped kitchen, serving cocktails at the wide bar, and sit for a delicious feast at the lovely dining table for twelve.All six bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and doors to the terrace. The spacious master suite includes a king bed, and its bathroom features a lovely stand-alone tub.Four of the guest suites have queen beds while the other has two twins which can be converted to an Eastern King upon request. Each bedroom has air conditioning and a TV.The world-class art, film, and dining of downtown Palm Springs are minutes from your door, while golfers are five minutes from Mesquite and an easy drive to Escena, Indian Canyons, and PGA West. You're about twenty-three miles to Indio, home of Indian Wells and the Coachella Music Festival. The villa includes a parking garage as well as an charging station for electric cars.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bring your modern family on a ski holiday to a contemporary chalet at Caldera Valles. This exquisitely designed Jackson Hole vacation rental is on the penthouse level of Caldera House, which offers the amenities of a luxury boutique hotel and the privacy of a home in the heart of Teton Village. Its four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight in a convenient ski-in location.Guests are welcome to use the shared fitness center, sauna and heated outdoor pool at Caldera House. The villa also has its own private balcony with a hot tub and al-fresco dining for six, as well as cozy indoor entertaining areas including a media room and featuring Apple TV, a sound system, Wi-Fi, a fireplace and a wine fridge.Wyoming-based firm Carney Logan Burke designed the complex with materials drawn from the surroundings, from Douglas-fir timbers to copper panels, along with plenty of glass to showcase the views. The villa picks up on this thoughtful style, with vaulted ceilings and nearly wall-to-wall windows that frame a vista of Rendezvous Mountain. The open-concept living and dining areas are sleek and sophisticated, and the kitchen is fully equipped.Caldera Valles has two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own lounge area, fireplace and balcony. The other two bedrooms have two twin bunk beds and two twin beds plus two trundle beds, respectively. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.A slopeside location gives Caldera House ski-in access from Jackson Hole Resort. It’s also a 1-minute walk from the hotel to the resort’s aerial tram, and a 2-minute walk to the center of Teton Village, where you’ll find a range of shops and restaurants. A short drive will bring you to the nearest golf course and the town of Jackson, and both Grand Teton National Park and Yellowstone National Park are also reachable by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let your surroundings inspire you at Sunset Ridge. The rugged Colorado landscape and bold modern architecture combine to stunning effect at this luxury Telluride vacation rental. Look no further for a spectacular backdrop to a family reunion in the mountains, ski holiday with friends or even a destination wedding that showcases the wild beauty of the West.The villa was built around a private pond that’s still fed by a stream passing underneath the house. Take in the panoramic views of the San Juan Mountains from the a pond-side pavilion with a firepit, lounge area, and outdoor entertaining area with a barbecue, TV and al-fresco dining for six. Entertain with ease indoors around the wet bar and home theater, test your skill in the games room, or stretch out after a day on the slopes in the fitness room or sauna.Renowned Aspen architect Bill Poss designed Sunset Ridge to make a bold yet minimalist statement, with strong lines, intriguing angles and glass walls that show off the mountain views. The open-plan great room has some elements of classic mountain lodges—a wood-paneled vaulted ceiling, a central fireplace—but the furnishings are sleek and contemporary, and pale stone accents keep the look light and airy. The sitting and dining areas are grouped around the fireplace, and the fully equipped kitchen sits between the great room and a tucked-away TV lounge.The villa’s bedrooms are divided between three wings for space and privacy; all six have en-suite bathrooms. The honeymoon-worthy master suite, which has a king bed, fireplace and sunset views, shares a wing with a second master, which has a queen bed. Three guest master suites with king beds are grouped together near the entertaining areas. The sixth bedroom has two queen bunk beds and its own kitchenette, and could be used as quarters for older children.From the home’s exceptional location in the Gray Head neighborhood, it’s less than 15 miles to the world-class slopes at Telluride Ski Resort, shopping and dining in the town of Telluride, and even the Telluride Golf Course. If you can’t get enough of the mountain views, make the 19-mile drive to the beautiful Alta lakes and the eerie ghost town nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One of the few rental properties on Lake Austin, this prestigious Texan home is the life of the party. Gather the group for a beach volleyball match or a little 3 on 3 basketball. At night, move the competition inside to the games room or celebrate your victory with a rejuvenating soak in the hot tub. Then, set out to explore Austin’s bustling downtown core, just 15 miles from home.Designed for large groups, this updated ranch-style home is perfect for kitchen parties, backyard barbecues, and wild nights in. The extra-tall ceilings give off airy and impressive vibes, while cozy leather furniture and a stone fireplace will make you feel the warmth of home. After dinner in the stone-arched formal setting, throw the big game on the projector screen and kick-back in the media room.In the afternoon, work on your tan from a poolside lounger while the kids show off their diving skills from the dock. Bring a towel to the beach pad and feel the sand between your toes while enjoying views of the lake. When the sun begins to set, pick a bottle of wine to go with an alfresco dinner next to the outdoor fireplace. Then, enjoy the solitude of the lake while the kids play air hockey inside.Austin may be the perfect mixture of nightlife, culture, and natural wonder. Grab your hiking boots and head 1 mile to River Place Nature Trail to get the lay of the land. For a fantastic photo op, hike 30-minutes up Mount Bonnell. After, head downtown The Contemporary to check out the latest art exhibitions. Then, have dinner at Franklin Barbecue, followed by a little bar-hopping on 6th Street.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Skyline views and solitude are always in style at this trendy villa, just 5 miles outside of downtown Austin. Watch as the sun rises from the terrace while you sip espresso. Do a little reading in a poolside sun chair before heading in for breakfast. Then, set out to explore nearby natural wonders on the trails of Barton Creek Wilderness Park or atop the lookout of Mount Bonnell.Designed by renowned architect, Bernardo Pozas, this modern villa was created to capture the gorgeous Austin skyline. Gaze out floor-to-ceiling windows, or step outside to multiple balconies for an even better look. Follow stunning marble-floors through thoughtfully-crafted open concept interiors.On quieter nights, curl up on the sofa and binge a new series on the streaming tv, or pamper yourself with a long soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub. If you’re feeling festive, fire up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen and grill something fresh from a local market. Then, gather around the fire pit for smores or take the party to the hot tub.Start the next day with a stroll along the shore of Lady Bird Lake, 6-miles away. Then, make your way downtown for a quick lunch. The taco stands around the convention center are incredible. After you’ve eaten, take a tour of The Contemporary, a cutting-edge art museum or head uptown for a history lesson at Bullock State Museum. At night, the bars on 6th Street are always buzzing.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please not that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Creek Crossing is a contemporary luxury home in the exclusive community of Aspen Creek Crossing. Spacious modern interiors, state-of-the-art amenities and six suite-style bedrooms make this vacation rental the perfect choice for groups of up to eighteen friends and family. A location only minutes from Park City Mountain Resort and Park City’s historic Main Street puts skiing, shopping, dining and more within easy reach.Take in the mountain views and savor warmer weather from the wraparound deck, which has sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. A lawn offers space to play, and a Utah-built Bullfrog hot tub is the spot to relax. If you’ve been out on the slopes, leave gear in the dedicated ski storage area, put a favorite album on the sound system or a favorite show on the smart TV, or sip refreshments from the wet bar in the media room.The villa’s contemporary architecture, including custom glass walls and soaring ceilings, creates bright, airy spaces for relaxing or gathering together. A two-story stone fireplace is the focal point of the open-plan great room, with a sitting area around the hearth at one end, a formal dining area that seats ten at the opposite end, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar in the middle.Each of the six bedrooms at Creek Crossing has an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom where you can relive your honeymoon thanks to a fireplace and furnished private balcony, and three bedrooms with queen beds. The remaining bedroom has two double beds as well as a roll-out bed, and a queen sofa bed is also available.With the closest ski lift only a 3-minute drive from the villa, you’ll be able to maximize your time on the slopes. If you’ve had your fill of Park City Mountain Resort, you can drive to Deer Valley Resort or take a break to explore the charming historic Main Street in downtown Park City. Visit Utah Olympic Park to try a bobsled ride if you dare, enjoy a performance at the Eccles Center or reserve a tee time on one of the nearby golf courses if you’re on holiday during the summer.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed by renowned architect Michael Upwall, King’s Estate truly is ski-home royalty. Standing proudly in the exclusive gated Deer Crest Community, this three level home features a spectacular glass elevator, glorious mountain views, home theater and private outdoor hot tub, to name but a few of its luxury features. Ski-in/ski-out access to the slopes makes this unique home an unparalleled choice for your Park City ski vacation.Explore the mountainside by day, and return for a rewarding session in the sauna to ease your muscles and discuss your evening plans. For an evening of indoors entertainment, head to the wine cellar – host a cheese and wine party, or simply pour a glass to enjoy with a movie in the impressive home theater. Recline in gorgeous velvety seats and enjoy an authentic theater experience. Or meet at the in-house bar before heading outside to the magnificent decked balcony. Take a seat around an atmospheric open fire, and gaze out to stupendous views across tree-lined peaks. You’ll want to use the barbeque for at least one of your meals, dining al fresco in the crisp night air. After dinner, retire to the hot tub and welcome the night in style. While the whole home benefits from Upwall’s supreme talent for design, the main lounge is the crowning jewel. A spectacular modern fireplace is the main feature, rising tall and majestic from the polished wood floor. The double height ceiling and panoramic windows gift a wealth of natural light to this wondrous space, and a quirky curved upstairs balcony gives a delightfully open-plan, social feel. The dining area has a more intimate atmosphere, as does the snug second lounge. A stylish, innovative space, you’ll enjoy preparing your vacation meals in the well-equipped kitchen. It even has an earth stone pizza oven as well as a conventional stove. A half moon breakfast bar is great for laid-back mornings.A natural, earthy color pallete runs through the exceedingly comfortable king size, queen and bunk rooms, creating a restful, peaceful ambiance. Gas fireplaces and televisions in three of the rooms are your toolkit for winding down at the end of a fun-filled evening. Light, airy and elegant en-suites accompany each bedroom.Whether you’re a skier, or visiting for summer activities in the great outdoors, the Deer Valley Resort delivers the experience of a lifetime. Nearby Park City is a hub of entertainment and brilliant for shopping and dining.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find the charm of a private setting along with a convenient location at the idyllic Bristol Road Estate. Nestled on quiet, wooded Bristol Glen in the town of Kenwood, this California vacation rental features resort-worthy outdoor living areas on 2.5 acres—and is only a short drive from the nearest wineries, restaurants and more. The estate’s four bedrooms are the perfect size for a small family, a wine country getaway with friends or even a Napa and Sonoma honeymoon.The villa’s beautiful outdoor living areas let you seek out sunshine or shade. Read under an umbrella on the deck just off the house, nap on a lounger on the sun-kissed pool terrace, have lunch from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining table, and end the evening with refreshments at the pergola-covered bar and outdoor kitchen, which is lighted for nighttime use.The indoor living areas at Bristol Glen are laid out around a stunning double-height living room with two-story windows overlooking the wooded surroundings and a massive stone wood-burning fireplace. The living room is flanked by a dining room with seating for eight on one side, and by a gorgeous fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and wine cooler on the other.The master suite offers a certain coziness along with luxury, thanks to a king bed, en-suite bathroom, balcony and a gas fireplace that will quickly warm up cooler wine country nights. Two other bedrooms with a king bed and queen bed, respectively, share a bathroom, and the fourth bedroom has a queen bed and shared hall bathroom. For larger parties, a queen sofa bed is available in the den.It wouldn’t be a holiday in wine country without a tasting or two; luckily, you’ll find the nearest wineries only a 10-minute drive from Bristol Glen. The villa is also less than 10 miles from dining and shopping in Kenwood and Glen Ellen, as well as attractions like Sonoma Valley Regional Park and Bouverie Wildflower Preserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy slopeside living in a premier setting at Sleeping Giant. One of the well-appointed private residences at the exclusive One Steamboat Place resort, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental offers ski-in, ski-out access to a gondola along with luxury amenities. Plan a ski holiday with up to eight friends or family at this four-bedroom retreat.Guests of the villa are welcome at the shared pool, hot tubs, fitness center and games room at One Steamboat Place. Kids can make friends in the resort’s children’s center while grown-ups enjoy the wine cellar and tasting room or make an appointment for indulgence at the spa. You can also opt to entertain at the villa, thanks to a deck with a gas barbecue, wine fridge and a spacious great room laid out around a cozy gas fireplace.The great room at Sleeping Giant uses natural textures, plush fabrics and handcrafted details to sophisticated effect. The classic stone fireplace surround is set off by a modern striped area rug and tuxedo-style sectional, and in the adjacent dining area, the handmade table seats ten. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the space and features a breakfast bar, Viking appliances and colorful cabinets.Sleeping Giant has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms and two bedrooms with queen beds, one with an en-suite and one with a shared bathroom. For privacy, the king master suite is separated from the other three bedrooms by the great room. Wood-trimmed windows and neutral walls and bedding make the rooms feel serene and welcoming after a day on the slopes or at the springs.Once nicknamed Ski Town USA, Steamboat Springs still has some of the best runs in Colorado. Guests of Sleeping Giant are just a 1-minute walk from the nearest gondola, and the resort also offers a seasonal shuttle. Bring the kids to Old Town Steamboat Springs to splash in the pools and play on the slides, or your sweetheart to the Strawberry Park springs for a honeymoon-worthy soak and some stargazing. If you’re visiting in warmer weather, test your skill on the Rollingstone Ranch golf course a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Treasure every moment of your ski holiday at Grouse Mountain 510. This beautifully appointed vacation rental in exclusive One Steamboat Place looks out over the clock tower atop the Steamboat gondola and the base of the ski area. Its open-plan layout is designed for entertaining, and four bedrooms make it easy to host up to ten friends and family members.Your stay at One Steamboat Place includes complimentary winter shuttle service and seasonal continental breakfast, as well as access to a shared pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room and more. If you’d prefer to entertain in private, Grouse Mountain 510 has its own furnished deck with a barbecue, cozy gas fireplace and flat-screen television.This luxury unit is laid out around an open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, large enough for the whole group to gather in. Together with the stone fireplace, furnishings in rich tones of chocolate and crimson make for a warm, welcoming ambience. Gourmet appliances and a breakfast bar make the kitchen wonderfully inviting to cooks and diners alike.The four bedrooms are laid out along the length of the villa for comfort and privacy. At one end you’ll find the master bedroom, which has features worthy of a honeymoon suite from a king bed and en-suite bathroom with hot tub to a fireplace. A guest master suite at the opposite end also has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and en-suite. The fourth bedroom is ideal for parents traveling with children or a group of older kids, with its queen bed, double bunk bed and hall bathroom.Grouse Mountain 510 puts you at the heart of Steamboat Springs, only a 1-minute walk from the gondola, a 1-mile drive from shopping and dining and a 2-mile drive from Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. Be sure to visit the town’s namesake hot springs for a restorative soak in the mineral waters and an up-close look at one of Colorado’s natural wonders.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A swimming pool and sports courts create a playground in the desert at this La Quinta estate. Set on 1.3 private acres backed by palm trees and the mountains, this villa makes the most of the space with generous entertaining areas, inside and out. Stay and play here or make it a base for a Coachella trip, a golf getaway, or a visit to Indian Wells, all a short drive away.Face off against family and friends across the outdoor ping-pong table and 3 outdoor sports courts for bocce, basketball, and pickleball. If things get heated, cool off in the swimming pool or take a soak in the hot tub. If you’ve worked up an appetite, heat up the barbecue for lunch or dinner at the alfresco table for 8.The villa is just as well equipped to entertain a crowd inside, with 2 living rooms separated by a double-sided fireplace, 2 dining areas, and a separate media and games room. The fully equipped kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar, and if you need more flexibility, the 2-bedroom casita has its own kitchenette.This is the place to be for music and golf, with the Coachella festival grounds 7 minutes away, the PGA West Clubhouse 8 minutes away, and the Indian Palms Country Club 9 minutes away. Take a day trip to Palm Springs for a tour of its iconic mid-century architecture or to Joshua Tree National Park for a hike in its otherworldly scenery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Colorado Lodge is an exquisite penthouse suite one the eleventh floor of the Ritz-Carlton Bachelor Gulch, a world-class resort with ski-in/ski-out access to Beaver Creek. The villa evokes the feeling of a private mountain chalet with spacious living areas built of fine timber and stone and sweeping views of the mountain and slopes, while its four bedrooms provide comfortable accommodations for eight guests. The vacation rental includes access to the Ritz-Carlton's extraordinary amenities, including pools, hot tubs, a fitness center, tennis courts, and a ski concierge. Complimentary shuttle service takes you to Beaver Creek Village and the resort's base, about nine minutes away.Open-concept interiors offer a superb venue for relaxing with loved-ones after an exciting day on the slopes or hiking trails. Kindle a fire and watch your favorite shows in the lounge, or select a bottle of wine to savor in the stylish tasting area. Step onto the balcony to sip hot cocoa while watching the late skiers on the Beaver Creek piste. Enjoy your dinner alfresco on warm summer evenings, or gather around the indoor table for hearty feasts beneath the stunning wrought-iron chandelier.The kitchen blends rich wood cabinetry with high-end, stainless steel appliances and includes a breakfast bar. Natural wood paneling and beautiful masonry evoke a classic alpine ambiance throughout the home, while the Carol Hicks Bolston furnishings are at once elegant and cozy. Heating and air conditioning ensure comfort in all seasons.All four bedroom suites enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master suite includes a king bed and fireplace, and its deluxe bathroom boasts a shower and jetted tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed, one with a queen, and one with two twins. The queen and twin rooms open to balconies with lovely views.Bachelor Gulch Express Lift 16 will be your gateway to the Beaver Creek slopes, or you can take the shuttle to the resort's base in the heart of Beaver Creek Village. Vail is about a thirteen-mile drive. Golf-lovers can take their pick from the superb courses at Beaver Creak, EagleVail, Vail Golf Club, and Red Sky.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: K0063 Casa Sonora Grande CITY ID #0455 TOT Permit 3085 - Palm SpringsGaze out at the sweeping vistas of Tahquitz Creek Golf Resort and the San Jacinto Mountains from this superbly equipped villa in Palm Springs. Practice your short game on the private putting green before teeing off in the desert air. Then return for hot tub soaks, games of pool and lawn chess, and alfresco dinners under the sunset sky.Nestled on a quiet cul-de-sac just minutes from the airport, Casa Sonora Grande is an oasis unto itself. Multiple outdoor living areas are set amid fragrant citrus trees and graceful landscaping, offering ample space in the sun or shade. Fountains pour into the saltwater swimming pool beside the covered lanai, while a fire pit and courtyard hearth keep you toasty at night. Inside, a generous great room and gourmet kitchen inspire festive evenings together, and the spaced-out bedrooms offer peaceful havens for downtime. The casita with bunk room is ideal for families with young children.Tahquitz Creek has been cited by Golf Digest as one of the top places to play in Palm Springs, and several other renowned clubs are within minutes of your door, including Mesquite and Escena. Drive about 5 or 10 minutes to reach the Moorten Botanical Gardens, the Palm Spring Art Museums, and some of the finest shopping and dining around. Music pilgrims are 24 miles from Coachella, or a 10-minute drive to the shuttle bus. Nature lovers and stargazers are about 40 miles from the incomparable Joshua Tree National Park.Copyright and copy: Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb Venice home is conveniently located within minutes of Abbot Kinney, Rose Avenue, and the Venice Canals. Spanning 4,363 square feet, the villa balances exquisite modern style with beautiful naturalistic accents, embodying the quintessence of this famed beachfront community in Southern California. Spacious and superbly appointed living areas include a fabulous rooftop terrace with alfresco dining and 360-degree views of Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Excellent media and cooking technologies, central air conditioning, and a lovely home office create a comfortable environment for all guests. The villa's four bedroom suites accommodate families, business travelers, and groups of friends up to eight in size.The roof terrace sets the scene for a vintage Venice getaway. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and luxuriate on the canopied bed. Sip coffee in the morning light and cocktails in the sublime sunset hour. Prepare delicious barbeque meals at the outdoor kitchen, and relish them alfresco in the sea-kissed breeze. Linger outside deep into the night, sipping California wines amid the glitter of Los Angeles and the vast night sky.The open-concept interior offers a cool, luminous haven for festive gatherings or private retreats. Magnificent wood-paneled ceilings harmonize with smooth stone floors, soothing white walls, and choice touches of vibrant color. Mid-century modern furnishings and light fixtures, along with a superb art collection, evoke a vintage Los Angeles ambiance. There are two comfortable lounge areas, including one with a fireplace and large TV, as well as a dining table for eight with gorgeous leather chairs. The kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a wonderful island breakfast bar.The exceptional master suite includes a king bed, lounge area, furnished terrace, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and freestanding tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed and two suites with queen-size beds. All have ensuite bathrooms.From the villa's two-car garage, you're within easy reach of Venice Beach (about seven minutes), Santa Monica Beach and Pier, and Marina del Rey. Los Angeles International Airport is less than six miles away, making the villa a convenient choice for wedding guests or weekend escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sonoma County Transient Occupancy Tax Certificate #414The refined and the rustic make a stunning pair at Moondance. Set only two miles outside the town of Sonoma, this spectacular California vacation rental boasts views across vineyards and lavender fields, extending to San Francisco Bay. Balancing the natural beauty are sophisticated interiors and four bedrooms perfect for a chic getaway with friends or a picturesque holiday with family.Take in the glorious vistas from a lounger by the infinity pool or a chair in the sunny sitting area on the terrace. As night falls, heat up the barbecue and sip wine by the outdoor fireplace or firepit before sitting down to dinner at the al-fresco dining table. On cooler evenings, relax indoors by the TV and fireplace, or stay in touch via Wi-Fi.From its architecture to its decor, sourced from all over the world, Moondance is a contemporary masterpiece. High ceilings, a floating staircase and a row of French doors leading to the terrace lend the living spaces a bright, airy feel, while multiple sitting and dining areas offer ample room to gather or steal a private moment. The fully equipped kitchen is in the center of it all, and has both pared-down, minimalist style and an inviting breakfast bar.This luxury property features two bedrooms in its main house and two in a guest house. In the main house, both bedrooms have king beds and balcony access; one has an en-suite bathroom and lounge area, and the other has a shared hallway bathroom. In the guest house, both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and balcony access; one has a king bed and the other has a queen bed.Though its hilltop perch feels secluded, Moondance is only a short drive from many of the must-sees and must-dos in Napa and Sonoma. It’s less than 10 minutes to Sonoma Plaza and the Sonoma Overlook Trail, for instance, and less than 10 miles to Glen Ellen and the Sonoma Valley Regional Park. Enjoy a thrilling day out at the Sonoma Raceway, then pick up provisions at Oxbow Public Market to take home or head into downtown Napa for a honeymoon-worthy dinner out.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get the sophistication of an urban retreat, the comforts of a private home and an incredible slopeside location at Jackson Hole Resort at Caldera Taupo. This beautifully designed vacation rental is part of the exclusive Caldera House, which offers the amenities of a luxury boutique hotel to guests of its eight suites. With four bedrooms, the Taupo suite is just the right size for a stay with extended family or a ski holiday with friends.The villa opens to its own balcony with al-fresco dining for six, a hot tub and a firepit. Or unwind inside after a day on the slopes with the help of the media room, Apple TV, sound system, Wi-Fi, fireplace and wine fridge.The interiors of Caldera Taupo, designed by Commune, use rich, earthy tones, modernist silhouettes and luxe natural materials in the open-concept great room for a sleek yet inviting feel. A pair of sofas is a welcoming place to stretch out in front of the fireplace, and there’s seating for ten around the mid-century-inspired dining table. More seating awaits at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped Boffi kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own fireplace and balcony. The fourth bedroom has three twin bunk beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same mix of warm wood and saturated tones that make the common living areas so appealing.Guests of Caldera House enjoy ski-in access to the property from Jackson Hole Resort. The complex is just a 1-minute walk from the resort’s aerial tram and a 2-minute walk from shopping and dining in Teton Village. While you’re in Wyoming, it’s well worth making the drive to Grand Teton National Park or the south entrance of Yellowstone National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The luxury residences at One Steamboat Place provide you with exquisite privacy and world-class Rocky Mountain lodge amenities literally steps from the Steamboat Slopes. Silver Creek Mountain 418, a four-bedroom suite, features mountain views, charmingly classic décor, and room for twelve guests, making it the perfect vacation rental for families and groups of friends seeking peaceful privacy at the heart of one of Colorado's top destinations.The suite's open plan interior features a wall of slope-view glass doors that fill the interior with lovely mountain light. A large sectional couch and comfy armchairs face the stone hearth with fireplace and mounted flat screen television, the ideal setting for toasty evenings together, while the elegant wooden dining table with seating for ten is where you'll share delicious meals. The kitchen is fully equipped with Viking appliances, and includes a breakfast bar for two. Outside the living area, you'll sip morning coffee and evening drinks on the balcony, and fire up the Viking grill for some hearty barbeque in the crisp mountain air.Silver Creek Mountain includes four perfectly cozy bedrooms: two with king beds and ensuite bathrooms, one with two charming bunk beds and ensuite bathroom, and one room with queen bed and bunk bed with access too the hallway bathroom. The master bedroom features its own fireplace and dual vanity, as well as stand-alone rain/steam shower and bathtub in its bathroom.As guests at One Steamboat Place, you'll have access to all of its communal spaces, including the gorgeous Great Room, the classy game parlor, the Little Tykes room for kids, and the outdoor pool and hot tub—perfect for a delicious, restorative soak between the day's activities and the night's festivities.There may be no better location for enjoying the delights of Steamboat. You're just a one-minute walk from the main entrance to Steamboat Gondola, and you're right at the heart of Mountain Village. City Market and Old Town Steamboat Springs are a short drive away. For golf, you're less than two smiles from Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And for a dip in Mother Nature's healing waters, check out Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, also a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breathe the morning air amid panoramic vistas of the San Juan peaks at this modern residence in Telluride Town. Ideal for 2 couples or a family of 4, the condo residence features light-filled interior living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and inspiring views of the nearby slopes. Walk to the nightlife along Main Street and catch the gondola up to Mountain Village.The 1,200-square-foot home blends contemporary style, high-end comforts, and beautiful alpine accents. An open-concept living/dining room welcomes you back from the mountain, featuring a fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, a table for 6, and a spacious TV lounge with gas fireplace. Generous windows infuse the interiors with natural light, and the wrap-around balcony enjoys expansive views. Fire up the barbeque for a well-deserved feast, or savor a glass of wine in the Rocky Mountain twilight.From Skyline at Meribel, you’re perfectly placed to enjoy the myriad delights of Telluride. It’s an easy walk to Main Street and Telluride Mountain Village Gondola, and a short drive to Telluride Golf Course. During the summer months, the city hosts an extraordinary array of world-class festivals celebrating film, jazz, bluegrass, cuisine, and much more--all within minutes of your door. Hiking and nature lovers will discover some of the most sublime landscapes in Colorado, including Bridal Veil, Ophir Pass, and Bear Creek Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kick back in your hot tub overlooking Lake Austin at this waterfront home northwest of downtown. Nestled on more than an acre of private estate, the family-friendly house features sprawling outdoor living areas leading down to the shore, as well as superbly equipped interiors for dining, downtime, and entertaining. Grill up a Texas-sized feast in the outdoor kitchen and relish it alfresco. Embark along the river from your private dock or drive 15 miles into Austin’s heart.The 6,400-square-foot villa gives a contemporary take on the Spanish Colonial style, with its cream-white facade, rich wood ceiling beams, and arcaded veranda. The terrace and yard give you everything you need to relax and enjoy the outdoors, from the fully equipped kitchen to the ample lawn to the generous pool under towering trees. Indoors, a second gourmet kitchen serves multiple living and dining areas, and Old Texas survives in the lounge with fireplace, bar, and nearby piano. Business travelers will appreciate the roomy and light-filled office suite, while the media room with kitchenette is perfect for late-night gatherings.Situated at a tranquil remove from Austin’s urban bustle, the villa is still within easy reach of the Capitol, the Convention Center, and the city’s finest nightlife spots. Head to Zilker Metropolitan Park for an SXSW show or a dip in Barton Springs, and grab your clubs for a round at Barton Creek Coore & Crenshaw Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski slope views, cozy interiors and luxury amenities make Heavenly Peak 310 a paradise in the Rocky Mountains. Part of the One Steamboat Place community, this Colorado vacation rental offers guests access to shared resort facilities and a location just steps from the gondola. The modern, open-plan layout and four bedrooms can easily host up to eleven friends or family members on a ski holiday, golf getaway or outdoor adventure in beautiful Steamboat Springs.One Steamboat Place invites guests to use the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room, communal spaces and more. Take the complimentary winter shuttle service around the area, ask the ski valet for assistance with gear or inquire about excursions with the concierge. You can even let the kids make friends in the Little Tykes room while keeping an appointment in the resort’s lavish spa. After a day spent adventuring or relaxing, have a laid-back barbecue on the villa’s private balcony or step inside to warm up by the fireplace and flat-screen television.Heavenly Peak 310 is designed to bring everyone together in the inviting central great room, where a roomy sectional and buttery leather armchairs are clustered around the fireplace. Celebrate a special occasion at the formal dining area, or refuel before your next ride up the gondola at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Four bedrooms let guests have space and privacy—the better to rest up for another day out in the mountains. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms: a master suite that’s set by itself on one side of the great room, and a second bedroom on the opposite side of the villa with a stand-alone bathtub straight out of a honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms have bunk beds; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other is next to a hall bathroom.While Steamboat Springs is known for its skiing, there’s plenty to do year-round in this natural wonderland. Test your skill on ski runs that have hosted World Cup competitions, or go easy with a little nighttime snow tubing. In the summer, tee off at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch golf course or fish, kayak and raft on the Yampa River. Don’t miss the area’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly pools at Old Town to the natural spring-fed ones at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched up high along the winding streets of the Hollywood Hills, this luxurious four bedroom shows off the classic style of the silver screen with an updated modern twist, sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Sunset Supreme enjoys an incredibly scenic vista of Los Angeles, reminding you that Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, Malibu, and Hollywood are all just a few minutes away.Showing pride in its large construction, Sunset Supreme’s exposed steel beams outline the two-story living room, opening the space with floor-to-ceiling glass that captures an incredible view of the city below. This sleek and stylish vacation rental lives up the highest standards of design and decor that are synonymous with the homes of the Hollywood Hills. Thoughtfully positioned atop Sunset’s Oak floors, you’ll find contemporary designer furnishings, high-end electronics, and a beautiful brick fireplace. Throughout the villa’s white, canvas-like walls, you’ll enjoy an extensive collection of modern works of art. And, in the kitchen, you’ll love the functional, extra-wide galley style layout, with state of the art appliances and thick granite countertops.Inside and out, you’ll enjoy cable televisions, Sonos sound systems, elegant dining areas, and relaxing lounge spaces. On the terrace, the lap pool and hot tub are great spots to enjoy the city view. Back inside, the cozy home theatre is ideal for movie nights with family and friends. And, when it’s time to retire for the evening, all four of Sunset’s bedroom’s come with en-suite bathrooms, and king or queen sized beds.The sheer amount of World-renowned attractions within fifteen miles of Sunset Supreme is absolutely astounding. If you’re in the mood to shop, Rodeo Drive is the perfect place to spend an afternoon. For nightlife, the Sunset Strip is just down the hill. If you’re traveling with children, Disneyland, Universal Studios, and the Griffith Observatory are great spots for family fun. And, when it’s time to hit the beach, you’ll love the option to compare between Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and Malibu Pier, three of the most vibrant beach communities on the planet.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get mountain views in the distance and slopes at your doorstep at Hayden Lodge 2207. This bright, spacious Aspen Snowmass vacation rental offers vistas of the Elk Mountain range from its Snowmass Village location and is slopeside to Fanny Hill. Reserve its two bedrooms for a ski holiday as a family, a getaway with another couple or even a honeymoon in the Colorado mountains.Guests of the villa are welcome to use the shared ski lockers, outdoor hot tub and children’s center at Hayden Lodge. The villa also has its own private balcony where you can relax with a cocktail after a day out, as well as a TV and Wi-Fi for evening entertainment.Hayden Lodge 2207 is laid out around an open-concept great room with a living area, a dining table that seats six and a fully equipped kitchen. A contemporary stone and wood gas fireplace makes the living area particularly cozy, and a breakfast bar makes it easy to grab a cup of coffee or a quick snack between runs from the kitchen.This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed and an en-suite bathroom with a jetted tub, and one bedroom with two twin beds that shares access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties or those looking for more flexible accommodations, a queen sofa bed is also available.A stay at Hayden Lodge offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Village Express chairlift, and puts you just a short drive from several other resorts, including Buttermilk Mountain and Aspen Highlands. For après-ski shopping, dining and nightlife, make the 3-minute drive to Snowmass Village or head into downtown Aspen. If you’ll be visiting during the summer, the villa is an easy drive from both the Snowmass Club Golf Course and the Aspen Golf and Tennis Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get the ultimate ski-in, ski-out access to Steamboat Springs at Vermillion Peak 707. This beautifully appointed vacation rental at One Steamboat Place overlooks the plaza at the base of Steamboat Ski Resort, so you’re never more than a few minutes from your next run. The open-concept interiors and four suite-style bedrooms can welcome groups of up to fourteen friends or family members.Guests of Vermillion Peak 707 are welcome to use the shared amenities at One Steamboat Place, including the heated outdoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, games room and playroom. A shared ski storage area with boot dryers means you don’t have to worry about where to leave your equipment between runs—or about damp gear. For entertaining in private, the villa has its own furnished balcony with a barbecue, as well as a TV and Wi-Fi inside.An open-plan great room makes it easy to enjoy time together at this luxury property. Gather on the sofa in front of the fireplace and TV, around a dining table that seats ten, or at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen. Details like wood floors lend a warm, welcoming ambience, while a set of doors to the balcony floods the space with light.All four of the villa’s bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. There are two with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a rain shower and gas fireplace. The other two bedrooms are ideal for kids or parents traveling with children, and have a queen bed plus queen bunk bed and queen bed plus twin bunk bed, respectively.Ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola puts you at the heart of one of Colorado’s best ski areas. The villa is also a 5-minute drive or less from the well-stocked City Market and, for summer visitors, the Rollingstone Ranch golf course. Be sure to leave an afternoon or evening of your holiday free to visit the area’s famed hot springs, from family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town to the scenic rock-lined pools at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sawtooth Mountain is a luxury suite within the One Steamboat Place complex at the foot of Steamboat Mountain, just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. With four bedrooms that sleep ten, along with shared access to world-class mountain lodge amenities, this is the perfect vacation rental for skiers and hikers seeking a private home base at the foot of one of Colorado's finest mountains.With lovely views of Steamboat through large, mountain-facing windows, the suite's interior area fills with beautiful alpine light. The open plan living area includes two plush cozy couches and armchairs of supple red leather facing the stone hearth with wood burning fireplace, perfect for staying toasty with family and friends. Beside the hearth, the mounted flat screen television is perfect for nighttime entertainment. The nearby kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art Viking appliances, ideal for preparing hearty meals, which you'll enjoy together at the beautiful dining table with seating for ten. The décor and furnishings are at once comfortable and elegant, creating an ambience of pure Colorado charm. Just off the living area, you can breathe the alpine air on the outdoor balcony, which includes a Viking gas grill for barbeque.The suite's four bedrooms includes three rooms with king size beds and one with a queen bed and double size bunk bed—perfect for children. All of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom features its own stone hearth and fireplace, and its ensuite bathroom includes stand-alone steam shower and bathtub. With wonderfully cozy bedding and televisions in each room, you'll enjoy peaceful downtime after returning from the slopes, and nights of deep sleep before the next adventure.As guests at One Steamboat Place, you'll enjoy its communal spaces and amenities, including the old-school game parlor, the stunning Great Room, and the delicious outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. There is also a Little Tykes room for kids.From main entrance of One Steamboat Place, you're perfectly positioned for a Steamboat adventure. The Gondola is literally steps away, and you're right in the heart of Mountain Village. City Market and Old Town Steamboat Springs are just minutes away, as is Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course for some of the best golf in the Rockies.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
